allow:
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -h localhost -P 3306 mvdsb -e "
-- Check sample of players with empty PKZ
SELECT p.id, p.pkz, p.name, p.vorname, p.geburtsdatum, p.status, p.beatimestamp
FROM person p
WHERE p.status = 1 AND (p.pkz IS NULL OR p.pkz = '''')
ORDER BY p.beatimestamp DESC
LIMIT 10;")
